# Storage {#sec-production-storage}

We will use Network File System (NFS) storage to share data between servers.

## Configure NFS server at `194.95.75.12`

```bash
sudo apt update
```

```bash
sudo apt install -y nfs-server
```

Add

```
/ssd 192.168.12.8(rw,no_subtree_check,no_root_squash)
```

to `/etc/exports`.

:::{.callout-note}

`192.168.12.8` is the local IP address.

:::

```bash
sudo systemctl enable --now nfs-server
```

```bash
sudo exportfs -ar
```
